name: FrameFittingOption
shortdesc: Options for fitting placed or pasted content in a frame.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the FrameFittingOption &#40;a ObjectStyle, Oval, Rectangle, Polygon, Application or Document).

property.name: autoFit
property.shortdesc: If true, the last saved fitting options will be applied to the contents of a frame when it is resized.

property.name: leftCrop
property.shortdesc: The amount in measurement units to crop the left edge of a graphic.

property.name: topCrop
property.shortdesc: The amount in measurement units to crop the top edge of a graphic.

property.name: rightCrop
property.shortdesc: The amount in measurement units to crop the right edge of a graphic.

property.name: bottomCrop
property.shortdesc: The amount in measurement units to crop the bottom edge of a graphic.

property.name: fittingOnEmptyFrame
property.shortdesc: The frame fitting option to apply to placed or pasted content if the frame is empty. Can be applied to a frame, object style, or document or to the application.

property.name: fittingAlignment
property.shortdesc: The point with which to align the image empty when fitting in a frame. For information, see frame fitting options.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FrameFittingOption.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
